abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of HACS is allowed.
abort.min_ha_version: You need at least version {version} of Home Assistant to setup HACS.
abort.github: Could not authenticate with GitHub, try again later.

error.auth: Personal Access Token is not correct
error.acc: You need to acknowledge all the statements before continuing

data.acc_logs: I know how to access Home Assistant logs
data.acc_addons: I know that there are no add-ons in HACS
data.acc_untested: I know that everything inside HACS including HACS itself is custom and untested by Home Assistant
data.acc_disable: I know that if I get issues with Home Assistant I should disable all my custom_components

user.description: Before you can setup HACS you need to acknowledge the following

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthentication needed
reauth_confirm.description: You need to reauthenticate with GitHub.

abort.pending_tasks: There are pending tasks. Try again later.
abort.release_limit_value: The release limit needs to be between 1 and 100.

confirm_restart.title: Restart required
confirm_restart.description: Restart of Home Assistant is required to finish download/update of {name}, click submit to restart now.

removed.title: Repository removed from HACS
removed.description: Because {reason}, `{name}` has been removed from HACS. Please visit the [HACS Panel](/hacs/repository/{repositry_id}) to remove it.
